s.text: The Bricker Scholarship will provide support for students engaged in graduate and post-graduate work in the diagnostic sciences at our dental school.
The Bricker Scholarship will provide support for students engaged in graduate and post-graduate work in the diagnostic sciences at our dental school.
People here at the school have asked for the opportunity to support students and recognize his good work by participating in the Steven L. Bricker Scholarship Endowment.
A nationally recognized innovator in Oral Diagnosis and Oral Medicine, Steve is remembered as a gentleman whose care and concern for his students, friends and colleagues was warm and genuine.
People here at the school have asked for the opportunity to support students and recognize his good work by participating in the Steven L. Bricker Scholarship Endowment.
